com.soa.container.configuration.service
Interface CapabilityListener

public interface CapabilityListener

Interface implemented to be notified when the container configuration for one or more capabilities is changed.

Method Summary
 boolean capabilityUpdated(CapabilityConfiguration capability)
          Indicates a capability has changed.
 java.lang.String[] getInterestedCapabilities()
          Returns the capabilities this listener wants to be notified about.
 boolean retry()
          Triggers a configuration retry if the listener previously returned false when updating it's configuration.
 void rollback(long rollbackTo)
          Indicates the capability configuration will be rolled back to the specified date.
 void setConfigContext(com.soa.container.configuration.service.ContainerConfigContext context)
           
 

Method Detail

setConfigContext

void setConfigContext(com.soa.container.configuration.service.ContainerConfigContext context)

getInterestedCapabilities

java.lang.String[] getInterestedCapabilities()
Returns the capabilities this listener wants to be notified about.

Returns:
Array of URI's as strings identifying the capabilities the listener is interested in.

capabilityUpdated

boolean capabilityUpdated(CapabilityConfiguration capability)
                          throws GException
Indicates a capability has changed.

Parameters:
capability - CapabilityConfiguration that has changed.
Returns:
True if successfully processed, false if not. Returning false will result in the listener being told to retry periodically until successful.
Throws:
GException - Thrown when the listener encountered an error so severe that the container configuration should be retrieved again from the previous timestamp. Note, this will affect all other listeners and should be only be performed in the rarest of situations. It is recommended that each listener returns false instead and performs it's own retries without affecting the other listeners.

retry

boolean retry()
Triggers a configuration retry if the listener previously returned false when updating it's configuration.

Returns:
True if successful, false if not. Returning false will result in the listener being told to retry periodically until successful.

rollback

void rollback(long rollbackTo)
Indicates the capability configuration will be rolled back to the specified date. Therefore the next time capabilityUpdated will be called it will be with configuration changes from this date.

Parameters:
rollbackTo - Time in millis the configuration changes will be checked against.
